main event: On June 19, 1965, a bright object with a smaller object around it was observed in the Pittsburgh area for about 20 minutes.
interesting points: The larger object appeared to be stationary while smaller objects were seen moving around it,The sighting lasted for 20 minutes, during which the larger object moved South-East at about 20 mph before disappearing behind trees,The observer described the objects as silver or white and roughly pea-sized,Multiple witnesses reported seeing the objects on successive days,The conclusion drawn by investigators was that the sighting was of a balloon.
sighted object: One bright object with smaller objects around it
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. XXXXX, driving on Route 65
